topic.title: Tor
topic.body: When I access https://check.torproject.org/, it confirms I am using Tor. However,  http://127.0.0.1:43110 gives me an error telling me Tor is inactive. Which one is correct?

1528298428_14aByczNBeonC9sGu66hVrUt1Rm3J.body:
> [anotherneko](#comment_12_1LvGFs28pbTRSvaM94DNRK1z1Z6CaoAFZ7): Zeronet needs accrss to ControlPort, not only to SocksPort. But for web access SocksPort is enough.

Thank you!
